alert.note: Alert for Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 17 at 1:05AM CST until February 17 at 1:45AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Throckmorton County in west central Texas... * Until 145 AM CST. * At 105 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elbert, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Elbert around 115 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lusk and Us-183 Near The Throckmorton-Baylor County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
